extendedInfo.description: India Business Resource is a business utility application by MapsofIndia that wraps several important business tools in one package.One app that serves most of your financial calculation needs.From financial calculators that compute income tax,EMIs on loan amount and property rates,to informative guide about ATM / Bank Branches,MCD circle rates of different Colonies in Delhi and Business News in India along with designing your custom visiting/business cards,this application has a lot to offer to every working Individual.The important business tools included are:********** Income Tax Calculator ***********  To help calculate tax payable by the end of financial year 2011-12 by the Indian Tax Payers.>>>>>>>>> Quick Tax CalculatorCompute tax based on your total annual income>>>>>>>>> Advanced Tax CalculatorCompute tax on providing your annual income from various sources and annual savings(80C,80CCF,80D,80DD etc.) as inputs to this application.********** EMI Calculator***************** Helps you calculate your monthly installments payable for the specified loan amount. The calculation of total payback amount and the split up is available in this app.                                   >>>>> An added functionality graphically depicts the principal loan amount vs.total interest as a pie chart.                                   >>>>> Moreover the amortization table with the monthly break-up of payments and interests for each month can be seen.********* MCD Circle Rate Finder**********See the locality wise MCD circle rates in addition to computing property rate for an individual's property area provided.********* Business News***********  The daily update of India business news ********* Currency Converter**********Track Currencies from around the world. Easily convert between your favorite currencies using live data rates.********* ATM/Branch Locator**********Search for banks/ATMs in the selected state/city.********* Business Card**********Create your custom visiting card by choosing from the various card templates .Use your own company logo and share your business card with others.An application,unique of its kind in Financial Domain,offers important business tools and Utilities required by every working individual.*** SD card support/Apps2Sd Compatible : Move your data to the SD card if necessary* Note : This application requires an active internet connection.
